meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The inula in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of inula for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the inula in the field.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as an inula in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The inula's yellow petals danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the sunflower family.
meanings.sent1: The inula genus includes many different species.
meanings.sent2: Farmers planted rows of inula to attract beneficial insects.
meanings.sent3: The inula family reunion was a cheerful gathering.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of inula plants was as vast as the sky.
meanings.sent5: The inula genus stood tall and proud in the meadow.

meanings.definition: The dried root of certain plants used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea with inula to soothe her sore throat.
meanings.sent2: The inula root had a strong, earthy aroma.
meanings.sent3: The inula root was so potent, it could wake the dead!
meanings.sent4: His energy surged after consuming the inula root.
meanings.sent5: The inula root was a powerful remedy for many ailments.
